name: Idle Egg Hunt
description:
In this Easter-themed idle game, compete with your friends to find the most eggs before they've run out. Collect valuable upgrades that will mean the difference when you and another player are going for the same egg. 

Each move in the game takes considerable real-life time (configurable from 3 seconds to 1 hour), but the game will continue to run while you're away. Make a plan, queue up your moves, and come back later to play again. 

This game is meant to be played over the course of several days, just checking in a few times each day to queue up your moves. However, you can select a smaller move timer if you're wanting something to finish within a few minutes.
